changeSet.author: autor
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO postgres.public.credit_product (product_name, min_term, max_term, min_price, max_price, percent, type) VALUES ('Продукт1', 80, 120, 600000, 1500000, 9.4, 'DIFF'), ('Продукт2', 150, 200, 1500000, 3000000, 11.6, 'ANNUITY'); INSERT INTO postgres.public."user" (user_login, user_psw, user_name, user_role) VALUES ('nts', 'nts', 'Katar', 'CREDIT_MANAGER'), ('admin', 'admin', 'Admin', 'SUPERVISOR');
